thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: Nathaniel Lazorchak
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Nathaniel Lazorchak

author: Nathaniel Lazorchak
title: Nathaniel Lazorchak
text: Came in with a ticket for $2500 for a bed set at another store, salesman (Will Pitney) got us the exact same style of bed in a better color and equal, if not better quality of material for approximately $1500 with tax. Salesman spent time to help personalize the set and get it to us at a good price. Closer to a mom & pop shop than bigger chains.
